title: download_figure Server Functions — mod_download_figure_server
text: server function shiny module works  mod_download_figure_ui() automatically download figures within  shiny application. server function handles UI pop- code downloading plot PDF, PNG, SVG.  works  ggplot2 graphics base R plots. Base R plots must save object  recordPlot.

title: download_figure Server Functions — mod_download_figure_server
text: id, input, output, session Internal parameters shiny. filename name file plot saved figure plot downloaded. wrapped reactive  function width Width (inches) plot saved .  Default 8 must value 2 30. height Height (inches) plot saved .  Default 6 must value 2 30.

title: download_figure UI Function — mod_download_figure_ui
text: UI function shiny module works  mod_download_figure_server() automatically download figures within  shiny application. UI function provides "Download" button  results pop-users can enter plot height width options  download plot PDF, PNG, SVG. work ggplot2 graphics  base R plots. Base R plots must saved object recordPlot.

title: download_figure UI Function — mod_download_figure_ui
text: id, input, output, session Internal parameters shiny. label Label download button. Default "Download Plot".

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
code: run_app(   onStart = NULL,   options = list(),   enableBookmarking = NULL,   uiPattern = "/",   ... )

title: Run the Shiny Application — run_app
text: onStart function called app actually run. needed shinyAppObj, since shinyAppDir case, global.R file can used purpose. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. enableBookmarking Can one "url", "server", "disable". default value, NULL, respect setting previous calls  enableBookmarking(). See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. ... arguments pass golem_opts.  See `?golem::get_golem_options` details.
